name: Her name is Gaia
description:
Submission to  #NaturesBeauty Game Jam. The theme of the Game Jam was #NaturesBeauty, and to qualify to enter, participants must use at least one Procedural Worlds Tool.

Assets used:

Gaia Pro, Gena Pro, Fantasy Adventure Environment, Stylized Water 2, Stylized Grass Shader, Equilibrium VR, Nature Render.
